title: Time to Sell Those Meme Stocks?
description:
In this rebroadcast, Jack answers several listener questions on topics ranging from electric vehicle stocks to the outlook for inflation. Plus, is it time to throw in the towel on speculative tech stocks?

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
